statements: DELETE FROM healthcare_facility WHERE location = 'New York' AND bed_capacity > current_occupancy;
DELETE FROM ResourcesAllocation WHERE department = 'Emergency' AND resource_type = 'Nurse';
DELETE FROM PatientFlowData WHERE patient_id = 100 AND department = 'Emergency';
DELETE FROM ResourcesAllocation WHERE department = 'ICU' AND resource_type = 'Ventilator' AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM Hospital WHERE hospital_id = 2 AND available_beds > 0;
DELETE FROM facilities WHERE location = 'New York';
